H0.text: In what year did the five founding members of OPEC hold their first meeting. 1958

H1.text: In what year did the five founding members of OPEC hold their first meeting. 1959

H2.text: In what year did the five founding members of OPEC hold their first meeting. 1961

H3.text: In what year did the five founding members of OPEC hold their first meeting. 1960

A4.text: It was founded on 14 September 1960 in Baghdad by the first five members: Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia and Venezuela.
